description: User feedback collection and management system

quick_rating.question: How satisfied are you with the agent selection and results?

options.5: Excellent - Perfect agent selection, great results
options.4: Good - Mostly correct agents, satisfactory results
options.3: Average - Okay agent choice, acceptable results
options.2: Poor - Wrong agents selected, unsatisfactory results
options.1: Very Poor - Completely wrong agents, failed task

fields.name: agent_selection_accuracy
fields.question: Were the right agents selected for your task?
fields.follow_up: Which agents should have been selected instead?

fields.name: token_efficiency
fields.question: Did you feel the token usage was efficient?

fields.name: response_quality
fields.question: How would you rate the quality of the response?

questions: What agents would you like to see added?
Which current agents are most/least useful?
What tasks are currently handled poorly?
